article_title: Rallying support in W.Va.: Nearly 15,000 attend Trump rally in Charleston

article_metadata.author:
CHARLIE BOOTHE
Bluefield Daily Telegraph

og.description: With John Denver singing “Almost Heaven, West Virginia” in the background, Donald Trump entered the Charleston Civic Center to a full house and raucous cheers.
og.title: Rallying support in W.Va.: Nearly 15,000 attend Trump rally in Charleston

article_metadata.description: With John Denver singing “Almost Heaven, West Virginia” in the background, Donald Trump entered the Charleston Civic Center to a full house and raucous cheers.
